Messages.Value: Thank you for calling Travel Corp, my name is Lily Young, how may I assist you today?

Hi Lily, my name is John Smith and I'm having some issues with my recent trip to New York City. I had a flight delay and it caused me to miss a connecting flight, and then my luggage was lost. Can you help me?
I'm sorry to hear that, John. Let me pull up your booking information. Can you please provide me with your reservation number, flight number, and dates of travel?
Yes, my reservation number is 123456789, my flight was on United Airlines, flight number UA1234, departure date was February 10th at 10am.

Thank you, John. I can see that your flight was delayed by 2 hours, causing you to miss your connecting flight. I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Can you tell me more about your lost luggage? What airline did you fly with and do you have your baggage claim ticket?
I flew with Delta Airlines and yes, I have my baggage claim ticket. The flight number was DL5678, departure date was February 10th at 2pm.

Thank you for the information. I will file a report with the airlines to help locate your luggage. As for the flight delay, I can assist you with rescheduling your connecting flight or obtaining proper compensation. Which option would you prefer?
I would like to obtain proper compensation. What are my options?

Based on your delay, you are eligible for compensation. I can assist you with filing a claim with United Airlines to receive compensation for your inconvenience. Would you like me to assist you with this process?
Yes, please help me with that. Thank you so much for your assistance so far, Lily.
No problem at all, John. I have filed a complaint on your behalf and you should hear back from the airlines within 7-10 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
No, that's all. Thank you again for your help!
